headline: The Smartest Oil Stocks to Buy With $1,000 Right Now
summary: ConocoPhillips (NYSE: COP) is the kind of energy company that people generally think about when they think about an oil stock.  What does ConocoPhillips do?  ConocoPhillips describes itself as "one of the world's largest independent E&P companies."
